meanings.definition: Preventing or reducing slipping or sliding
meanings.sent1: The nonskid shoes helped me walk safely on the icy sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The nonskid surface of the playground kept the children from falling.
meanings.sent3: The nonskid socks made me feel like a superhero with sticky feet.
meanings.sent4: Her nonskid grip on the situation prevented any mistakes from happening.
meanings.sent5: The nonskid mat in the shower prevented any accidents from occurring.

meanings.definition: A substance or material used to prevent slipping or sliding
meanings.sent1: The boat deck was coated with nonskid to prevent accidents at sea.
meanings.sent2: The nonskid on the stairs made them much safer to climb.
meanings.sent3: The nonskid on the floor felt like walking on tiny grains of sand.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was like nonskid, keeping him steady in uncertain times.
meanings.sent5: The nonskid spray was a lifesaver for preventing falls on the dance floor.
